title: idea_spec_v1
$comment: IdeaSpec is an upstream intent artifact for agents. It is not executable. It must not inline or override policies; any policy references are by id only.

extensions.description: Forward-compatible metadata only. Must not override governance/policies.

policy_bundle_id.description: Optional read-only reference by id. If omitted, kernel defaults apply.

policy_bundle_path.description: Optional repo-relative path to policy bundle asset (read-only).

snapshot_id.description: Data snapshot id for compilation/run (required for deterministic job_id in workflow).
